sentences.sContent: Ecological discourse' can thus be seen as the most productive cultural form for generating and mobilising ideological consensus and dissentious in modern societies.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ecological discourse' can thus be seen as the most productive cultural form for generating and mobilising ideological consensus and dissentious in modern societies.
sentences.sCn: 生态学讨论可被视为最有效的文化形式，它产生和推动现代社会的思想共识和争论。

words.tran: 纠纷；意见不合；争吵；倾轧
